description:
* Fix for 1-indexed grid neighbor finding.

* Fixing setup.py for the case when the fortran kd tree isn't built.

* Updating version string

* Added tag yt-2.5.1 for changeset 34a5e6774ceb

* Updating version to 2.5.2

* Added tag yt-2.5.2 for changeset 2197c1014137

* Updating to 2.5.3.

* Added tag yt-2.5.3 for changeset 59aa6445b5f4

* Updating setup.py to 2.5.4 and changing description.

* Added tag yt-2.5.4 for changeset 4da03e5f00b6

* Bumping version to 2.5.5.

* Added tag yt-2.5.5 for changeset 21c0314cee16

* Fall back to TkAgg on OS X. Closees #642.

    This is due to a change in matplotlib 1.3.0:
    https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib/issues/2361
    https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib/pull/1613/

* Fixing the version string.  Closes #680.

* Updating to version 2.6

* Added tag yt-2.6 for changeset 053487f48672

* Added tag yt-2.6.1 for changeset d43ff9d8e20f

* Updating to 2.6.2

* Added tag yt-2.6.2 for changeset f1e22ef9f3a2

* Adding missing ProfilePlot imports.

* Fixing missing imports for YTNotInsideNotebook throughout yt.visualization.

* Updating version to 2.6.3.

* Added tag yt-2.6.3 for changeset 816186f16396

* Added tag yt-3.0.0 for changeset 73a9f7491572

* made small fix so that annotate_grids() correctly uses color maps.

* Added tag yt-3.0.1 for changeset 0cf350f11a55

* Updating version to 3.0.2.

* Added tag yt-3.0.2 for changeset 511887af4c99

* fixing a syntax error in the install script

* small correction to time_series_analysis.py

* Updating version to 3.1

* Added tag yt-3.1.0 for changeset fd7cdc483618

* parallel computation typo correction

* Add missing import.

* Another missing import

* Added tag yt-3.2 for changeset 28733726b2a7

* Updating copyright and license in accordance with http://lists.spacepope.org/pipermail/yt-svn-spacepope.org/2013-July/004177.html

* Updating copyright and license in accordance with http://lists.spacepope.org/pipermail/yt-svn-spacepope.org/2013-July/004157.html

* Sink particle files come from simulations that use ray tracing have one extra field so I made a quick
    change to read in star properties correctly if the star has 18 or 19 properties.

    -ALR, 7/21/15

* fixing a bug where particle_velocity_cylindrical_radius is being registered as particle_velocity_spherical_radius

* Backporting PR #1660 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1660

* Backporting PR #1662 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1662

* Backporting PR #1663 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1663

* Removing enzo installation from install script.

* Change to use 64 bit index for gind.  Closes #1057.

* Fixed multiplot crashing when supplied with profiles and user having to save individual plots before using them in multiplot.

* Backporting PR #1679 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1679

* Backporting PR #1680 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1680

* fixing a typo in the cosmology docs!

* [enzo] sort species names

* Fixing a bug where "center" vectors are used instead of "normal" vectors in get_sph_phi(), get_sph_theta(), and get_cyl_theta() in fields/particle_fields.py.

* Backporting PR #1685 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1685

* Backporting PR #1686 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1686

* Backporting PR #1689 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1689

* Add search bar to main doc page

* Backporting PR #1693 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1693

* Use the nice latex representation for units in field labels

* Backporting PR #1696 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1696

* Cast enzo grid left edges to int arrays to avoid errors in newer numpys

* Backporting PR #1698 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1698

* Backporting PR #1699 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1699

* Correcting two incorrect paths in the loading data docs

* Fix ds.h.find_max like functions for non-cartesian geometry

* Clarify formatting of a comment in plot_container.py

* Add support for particle fields to the [Min,Max]Location derived quantities

* Backporting PR #1701 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1701

* Backporting PR #1707 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1707

* [py3] Use OrderedDict for tests as it is included in answer's name

* Backporting PR #1710 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1710

* small doc theme css tweak

* Add proper start value for FNV hash

* Use truediv instead of div in units unit tests for py3 compat

* [tests] sort dictionary to ensure that test name is reproducible with py3

* Backporting PR #1726 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1726

* Ensure that width and center used during Camera initialization have common units. Fixes #1080,

* Make sure that fields passed to 'process_octree' during smoothing are contiguous. Fixes #1079

* Added tag yt-3.2.1 for changeset 425ff6dc64a8

* Removed tag yt-3.2.1

* Updating version numbers for 3.2.1

* Added tag yt-3.2.1 for changeset f7ca21c7b3fd

* Backporting PR #1668 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1668

* Backporting PR #1742 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1742

* Fixing a typo in the particle filter docs

* [testing] Avoid test failure if test_data_dir isn't configured

* If the parent has not had its dx set up yet, set it up here.

* Ensure plots are valid after invalidating the figure

* Ensure ARTIOIndex.get_smallest_dx() returns a quantity with units

* removing some dead code from the Chombo frontend

* Backporting PR #1752 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1752

* Backporting PR #1758 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1758

* Backporting PR #1764 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1764

* Fixing test failures on Numpy 1.10

* Backporting PR #1768 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1768

* fix issue #1086

* Fix casting issues for 1D and 2D Enzo simulations

* Handle the case where you have more than 10 on-disk particle fields in the file

* Support enzo answers tests with yt-3

* Fixing bug with redshift calculation in LightRay analysis module.  Forgot a 1!

* Backporting PR #1735 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1735

* Backporting PR #1766 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1766

* Backporting PR #1787 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1787

* LightRay was using reverse of LOS velocity.

* Document --answer-name

* Fix loading athena data in python3 with provided parameters

* Backporting PR #1831 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1831

* Backporting PR #1782 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1782

* Set these to zero to avoid problems with newest versions of SIMX. Should not change behavior at all for old versions.

* Backporting PR #1821 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1821

* Fixing width for off-axis SZ projections. Adding units when writing the SZ images to HDF5. Adding no_ghost and north_vector to the off_axis method.

* Stop referring to the requirements file in the installation docs

* Provide nice error message when triggering nose issue 701

* Fix issue with parsing gadget data in python3

* Fix issues with loading tipsy files in python3

* Backporting PR #1845 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1845

* Backporting PR #1846 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1846

* Backporting PR #1847 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1847

* Backporting PR #1851 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1851

* Changing author name and email

* Updating version numbers for yt 3.2.2 release

* Added tag yt-3.2.2 for changeset a7896583c065

* Avoid mixing floats and ints in stream parallel decomposition utility code

* Backporting PR #1863 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1863

* Do not try to include openmp support on Python 3.5.0

* Fix lextra and extra in ART frontend.

* Backporting PR #1876 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1876

* [bugfix] convert profile extrema to output_units instead of units, to be consistent with new behavior of array_like_field.

* Only set output_units after units has been set.

* Backporting PR #1890 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1890

* Backporting PR #1899 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1899

* Making PlotWindow show/hide helpers for axes and colorbar return self

* Correct docstring for load_uniform_grid

* Replace iteritems with items

* Backporting PR #1927 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1927

* Fix rst syntax error in getting help guide

* docs: increase margin for navbar, fixes #989

* Backporting PR #1930 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1930

* Use BytesIO in the png writer under python3

* Use six.BytesIO instead of six.moves.StringIO in TransferFunctionHelper

* Backporting PR #1933 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1933

* Reintroduce sanite_width for polar/cyl coordinates

    It was accidentally removed in PR 1826. Fixes behavior of SlicePlot when
    width is not provided for cylindrical and polar datasets

    Reported-by: Miguel de Val-Borro <miguel@archlinux.net>

* Backporting PR #1941 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1941

* Better error message when export_fits is not able to determine fields to export

* For 2D BoxLib simulations, the runtime parameter amr.n_cell was being read in a way that gave an incorrect number of values to ds.domain_dimensions. This has been corrected so that '1' is appended in the unused extra dimensions.

* Backporting PR #1950 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1950

* Backporting PR #1963 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1963

* Adding a hash cache

* Import HUGE from utilities.physical_ratios

* Fixing point tests

* Updating version numbers for 3.2.3

* Added tag yt-3.2.3 for changeset 80aff0c49f40

* Removed tag yt-3.2.3

* Fixing tab/space issue

* Backporting PR #1963 https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt/pull-requests/1969

* Added tag yt-3.2.3 for changeset 83d2c1e9313e

* Fix binniing for x,y and z fields in yt.data_objects.create_profile(...)
    To do: make it work when create_profile(... extrema=something ...)

* Correction: Made the extrema argument to create_profiles to apply for x,y and z bin fields if supplied.

* A fix in the explicit extrema logic branch.

* Ad-hoc fix to data field axes being transposed incorrectly for certain permutations of xyz bin fields.

* Added ProfileBinningTest2
title: Stable

content.raw: Something went wrong, you should checkout https://tests.yt-project.org/job/yt_testsuite/532/

Hi Boyan,

It looks like you worked on your fix from the stable branch. As a rule, we only accept changes from the development branch (which is named "yt"). You're going to need to rebase your changes onto the yt branch and then reissue your pull request.

Please let me know if you have any questions related to how to move your commits to the yt branch using mercurial - I'm always happy to answer mercurial questions.
content.html:
Hi Boyan,

It looks like you worked on your fix from the stable branch. As a rule, we only accept changes from the development branch (which is named "yt"). You're going to need to rebase your changes onto the yt branch and then reissue your pull request.

Please let me know if you have any questions related to how to move your commits to the yt branch using mercurial - I'm always happy to answer mercurial questions.
